Anthony Christopher Khan (ónyé a mụrụ Craig; amụrụ na Julaị 13, 1971), nke a maara site na aha egwu ya The Twilite Tone, bụ ónyé America na-emepụta ihe ndekọ, ónyé na-edekọ egwu, onye na'ede egwu, DJ, na onye na-elekọta redio. N'etiti ndị ọzọ, ya na Gorillaz, Kanye West, Common, Big Sean, John Legend, My Brightest Diamond na U-God rụkọrọ ọrụ n'etiti ndị mosusu.
A mụrụ Tone na Chicago, Illinois, United States, nné na nnà Indria Khan na Anthony Christopher Craig
A mụrụ Tone na aha nna Craig (aha nna ya), nke e mesịrị gbanwee ka ọ bụrụ Khan, aha nna ezinụlọ ya
Ọ bụ nwanne nna ya, Hassan Khan, ónyé lụrụ Chaka Khan na 1970, nwere mmetụta n'ahụ ya. Tone bụ nwa nwanne nne nke ónyé na-akụ egwu jazz bụ Richard Davis
Ọ mụtara ịkpọ opi na klas nke atọ, n'oge na-adịghịkwa anya mgbè nke ahụ gasịrị ọ mụtara ịkpọ ụbọ akwara
Ọ bụ ónyé ndú ngalaba drum n'òtù ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị ya, na DJ'd maka oge mbụ dị ka ónyé nọ n'afọ nke abụọ na ihe omume Kenwood Academy.
A na-ebu ụzọ kọwaara NO I.D

na ónyé na-eti egwu Chicago bụ Common na 1987, n'oge na-adịghị anya ọ ghọrọ DJ màkà ha abụọ n'òtù ha "CDR". Ndị otu ahụ dekọrọ otu LP ọnụ ma wepụta ya na 1989, n'okpuru aha 1015 ma ọ bụ 326 mgbè e mesịrị kpọọ Dion & Tony.

N'afọ 1989, Tone zutere ndị na-agba egwú abụọ, Reggie na Clay, ha wee mepụta Dem Dare, aka Darians, iji kwalite ihe omume ụlọ na hip-hop. Tone DJ'd na ihe ngosi mbụ Dem Dare kwalitere, nke méré na Club Alcatraz na Chicago
N'oge a, Tone mepụtara okwu Go-ill na Chic-Chic, dị ka ihe atụ màkà Chicago
N'afọ 1990, Tone malitere ịrụ ọrụ na Common demos.
N'afọ 2020, The Twilite Tone wepụtara abọm mbụ ya The Clearing on Stones Throw

The Clearing na-egosi ụda nke The Twilite Tone kọwara dị ka "trans-genre" nke bụ ngwakọta nke ụlọ, electronic funk, na ngwá ọrụ hip-hop nke na-aga n'ihu na ihe nketa nke Stones Throw nke akụkọ egwu na mmụọ nke obodo ya.
